head.title: Edit {{FileFormatUp}} signatures in {{ProgLang}} applications
head.description: Use the {{ProgLang}} API to easily modify signatures within {{FileFormatUp}} documents, including PDFs, Word files, Excel sheets, presentations, and images.

header.title: Effortlessly update {{FileFormatUp}} signatures
header.description: Gain full control to edit a variety of electronic signatures in major formats such as PDF, Word, Excel, presentations, and images with the advanced features of {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Unlock the capabilities of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) not only offers robust document signing but also allows you to easily modify existing signatures. Adjust signature properties in widely-used formats like PDF, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint presentations with minimal effort.

more_features.title: Complete signature management for documents
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} simplifies your document workflow by enabling you to easily add, update, search, verify, or remove signatures across all major file formats.

feature_1.title: Flexible document signing
feature_1.content: Apply a wide range of signatures, including text, images, barcodes, and stamps, to any section of your document. Modify embedded metadata like EXIF data in images, and secure documents against unauthorized changes using digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Signature search and validation
feature_2.content: Easily verify signatures with our powerful tools. Retrieve a full list of signatures in a document, ensuring quick and accurate verification.

feature_3.title: Simplified signature updates
feature_3.content: Update previously embedded signatures effortlessly. Adjust the content, style, placement, or any other aspect of the signature to meet new requirements.

feature_4.title: Effortless signature removal
feature_4.content: Gain full control over signature management, with the ability to remove any type of signature from your document, giving you total flexibility over its content.

formats.title: Modify signatures across multiple formats
formats.description: With the {{EnvName}} API, you can easily modify signed documents. Extract and update signature data from supported formats, maintaining full control over your document's integrity.

operations.title: Explore the full feature set
operations.description: Browse the extensive list of signature formats and operations supported by our platform.
